thread.title: Is Stevie Wonder about to announce he is NOT blind?
thread.title_full: Is Stevie Wonder about to announce he is NOT blind?

title: Is Stevie Wonder about to announce he is NOT blind?
text:
Is Stevie Wonder about to announce he is NOT blind? Is Stevie Wonder about to announce he is NOT blind? SINGING icon Stevie Wonder could be about to make a shocking revelation. / Published 8th February 2017 
Conspiracy theorists have claimed for years that Wonder can actually SEE – and the soul sensation is being tipped to prove them right. 
They point out "evidence" of pictures of him watching a basketball game in the US. 
GETTY “This year, I will reveal the truth” Stevie Wonder 
He also appeared to catch a falling mic stand live on TV and read the envelope while announcing a winner at the Grammys. 
The singer wasn’t born blind, but lost his eyesight not long after birth due to complications with premature birth. 
It has been thought in recent years he may have been regaining his sight. The top 10 conspiracy theories Friday, 22nd January 2016 From mind control, to the missing Malaysian airways flight MH370, here are the top 10 conspiracy theories. 1 / 10 AFP/Getty Images In 2011, Osama Bin Laden was killed by US Navy Seals and buried at sea, but now conspiracy theorists claim that it was all a lie and he is still alive 
And now the singer, born Stevland Hardaway Judkins, has revealed that he is about to drop a bombshell about his sight. 
In response to a TMZ question of whether he would do reality TV shows, The 66-year-old said: "I could buy me a few planes… Maybe fly them." 
When asked by the reporter if he could see, he then responded: "This year, I will reveal the truth." Related articles
